title: Premiere Pro gains MacBook Pro notch awareness, AI music retiming, offline speech to text in latest update
content:
Adobe’s software receives regular updates. Most of the February updates to the Creative Cloud software suite were focused on minor improvements and bug fixes, but Premiere Pro has gained some useful new features and improvements for video editors, including notch support on the new MacBook Pro.

more…
